data.description: Super easy way to create Animated Gifs w/ GD
data.similar: GD::Imager (tis a subclass of that module in fact ;p)
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I thought a simple one call way to create animated gifs based on a
    GD/GD::Image object would be handy and indeed it has for me :)
